AboutPage.title: About Antra Beverage Distribution

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Antra Beverage Distribution, we're committed to providing businesses across Belgium with reliable access to the world's leading beverage brands. We pride ourselves on exceptional service, competitive pricing, and building long-term partnerships with our clients.

values.title: Our Values
values.integrityDesc: We conduct business with honesty and transparency
values.excellenceDesc: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do
values.partnershipDesc: We build lasting relationships with our clients
values.innovationDesc: We continuously improve our services and operations

banner.title: We use cookies
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and improve our services.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different categories of cookies below.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.
